param.name: pocket_type
param.label: Type of pocket to detect
param.help: Search for different kinds of pockets - or select 'custom' for more fine-grained control

param.name: min
param.label: Minimum radius for an alpha sphere (angstroms)
param.help: An alpha sphere is an empty sphere in contact with 4 atoms in 3D space.

param.name: max
param.label: Maximum radius for an alpha sphere (angstroms)
param.help: An alpha sphere is an empty sphere in contact with 4 atoms in 3D space.

param.name: i
param.label: Minimum number of alpha spheres a pocket must contain
param.help: Below this threshold pockets will not be listed in results

param.name: D
param.label: Distance threshold for clustering algorithm (angstroms)
param.help: Alpha spheres may be clustered if they are separated by less than this distance

param.name: C
param.label: Clustering method for grouping Voronoi vertices
